General.Name: Shenzhen Inovance Tech
General.Description: Shenzhen Inovance Technology Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells industrial automation control solutions in China and internationally. The company offers automated industrial products, including inverters, servo, PLC, human-computer interaction, sensors, motors, PAC intelligent controllers, CNC controllers, and cabinet machines; energy storage systems and industrial power products; industrial robot systems, such as robot system, control cabinet, robot software, robot vision system, precision machinery, and optional accessories; and smart elevator products comprising elevator control cabinets and integrated controllers, elevator dedicated frequency converters, door machine and escalator integrated controllers, and elevator veneer and elevator accessories. It also provides low and medium voltage AC drives; industrial tailored products; servo drives and motors; PLCs and HMIs; motion controllers and I/O modules; elevator and escalator solutions; industrial internet products, which include industrial cloud platform, smart hardware, and IoT screens; new energy vehicles; and rail products. The company's products are used in industrial robots, fluid equipment, lifting, textile, material processing, car parts, precision manufacturing, smart elevator, robot, and industrial vision industries. In addition, it provides after-sales services, maintenance, and pre-sales advice services. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Huichuan Technology Headquarters Bldg, Shenzhen, China, 518110
